meanings: Verb make effort, endeavor, work hard
[명사] effort, exertion, (formal) endeavor, [동사] try, make an effort[endeavor], work hard, strive (for), (formal) endeavor, (formal) exert oneself
exert oneself as hard as possible

vlive.korean: [보고만 있어도 재밌는데 거기다가 노력까지 하는 우리 아기빵] 노력해볼게요! [This bay bread always does his best for fans] I'll do my best! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 아기빵 주먹이면 보호장비 없이도 UFC 가능이야👊🏻🦊 (I.N calling with HAN)
vlive.english: [This bay bread always does his best for fans] I'll do my best!

vlive.korean: 노력해보신대요 감사합니다! They said they would try. Thank you! 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : white (feat. 막내즈) #2
vlive.english: They said they would try. Thank you!

vlive.korean: 앞으로 더 좋은 엄마가 되기 위해 노력해볼게. I'll work hard to be a better mom. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: I'll work hard to be a better mom.

vlive.korean: 이거는 노력해볼게 그거 다... I'll try to finish this up. You have the rest... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 🐶🐱스쿨 유학 후 개학하다...!
vlive.english: I'll try to finish this up. You have the rest...

vlive.korean: [당신의 노래 점수는?? 63 조금만 더 노력해주세요...] [Your score? 63 Please try a bit harder...] View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.92
vlive.english: [Your score? 63 Please try a bit harder...]

examples.korean: Just try your hardest. 발음듣기 그저 최대한 노력해 보아라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
She has tried to lead a good life. 발음듣기 그녀는 착하게 살려고 노력해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has tried to lead a good life. 발음

examples.korean: Have you tried patching things up with her? 발음듣기 그녀와의 일[관계]을 수습하려고 노력해 보셨어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Have you tried patching things up with her? 발음

examples.korean: Successive governments have tried to tackle the problem. 발음듣기 연이은 정부들이 이 문제를 해결하려고 노력해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Successive governments have tried to tackle the problem. 발음

examples.korean: We have tried to pursue a policy of neutrality. 발음듣기 우리는 중립 정책을 밀고 나가려고 노력해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We have tried to pursue a policy of neutrality. 발음
